Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more!
Catering Packages 
Martin Luther King Day - We just wanted to wish everyone happy MLK day!
Upcoming Events Martin Luther King Day - We just wanted to wish everyone happy MLK day! Flat and Drum Wings 
Where Flavor Takes Flight

is a fast-casual restaurant located on James Island in Charleston, South Carolina, specializing in authentic, flavor-packed chicken wings served in both traditional and boneless styles. Our concept celebrates the classic debate of “flats vs. drums” by offering a wide variety of signature sauces, dry rubs, and specialty flavors inspired by Southern, Caribbean, African, and global cuisines.
Flat and Drum Wings read more about us Flat and Drum Catering 
Bring the flavor to your event

Turn any occasion into a flavor-packed celebration with Flat and Drum Wings catering. From office lunches and family gatherings to game-day spreads and special events, we've got you covered with wings, smash burgers, sandwiches, salads, and Southern-inspired sides. Choose from our wide variety of sauces, dry rubs, and specialty flavors to create the perfect lineup for your guests. Fresh, bold, and ready to share—our catering makes it easy to serve food everyone will love.

Order Flat and Drum

Your wings, your way—anytime

Craving bold flavors on the go? Order online from Flat and Drum Wings for quick pickup or convenient delivery. From signature wings and smash burgers to fresh salads and Southern-inspired sides, our full menu is just a few clicks away. Whether it's lunch, dinner, or a late-night craving, we'll bring the flavor straight to you.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

Nastassja T:
five star review by 
Soooo good I had the loaded mac and cheese today and it was soo good. I initially came in for wings but I heard another customer ordering and saying how they were just there last week and how good the Mac and cheese so I switched my order to try something new and it didn't disappoint! I was shocked at how many other options were on the menu. The place was nice and clean. Staff was friendly. I'll be back to try other options

Review by - Google

Graham G:
five star review by 
I have ordered from this spot on two separate occasions: once was the smash burger and the other time I tried their 10 piece lemon pepper wings and they both were honestly outstanding. Smash burger was huge! And the wings were outstanding! Fries were super tasty—don't even need ketchup. But I like to dip them in their ranch!!

Review by - Google

Courtney S:
five star review by 
I ordered the catfish sandwich, a variety of wings, and the loaded mac & cheese with honey hot sauce, and everything was absolutely delicious! The food came out in about 15 minutes. It was hot, fresh, and full of flavor. The customer service was excellent as well. 10/10 would definitely recommend!
